db:abstract.db:para: The QStylePainter class is a convenience class for drawing QStyle elements inside a widget.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QStylePainter extends QPainter with a set of high-level draw...() functions implemented on top of QStyle's API. The advantage of using QStylePainter is that the parameter lists get considerably shorter. Whereas a QStyle object must be able to draw on any widget using any painter (because the application normally has one QStyle object shared by all widget), a QStylePainter is initialized with a widget, eliminating the need to specify the QWidget, the QPainter, and the QStyle for every function call.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QStylePainter::QStylePainter(QWidget *widget)
db:section.db:para: Construct a QStylePainter using widget widget for its paint device.

db:section.db:title: QStylePainter::QStylePainter(QPaintDevice *pd, QWidget *widget)
db:section.db:para: Construct a QStylePainter using pd for its paint device, and attributes from widget.

db:section.db:title: bool QStylePainter::begin(QWidget *widget)
db:section.db:para: Begin painting operations on the specified widget. Returns true if the painter is ready to use; otherwise returns false.
This is automatically called by the constructor that takes a QWidget.

db:section.db:title: bool QStylePainter::begin(QPaintDevice *pd, QWidget *widget)
db:section.db:para: Begin painting operations on paint device pd as if it was widget.
This is automatically called by the constructor that takes a QPaintDevice and a QWidget.

db:section.db:title: void QStylePainter::drawComplexControl(QStyle::ComplexControl cc, const QStyleOptionComplex &option)
db:section.db:para: Use the widget's style to draw a complex control cc specified by the QStyleOptionComplex option.

db:section.db:title: void QStylePainter::drawControl(QStyle::ControlElement ce, const QStyleOption &option)
db:section.db:para: Use the widget's style to draw a control element ce specified by QStyleOption option.

db:section.db:title: void QStylePainter::drawItemPixmap(const QRect &rect, int flags, const QPixmap &pixmap)
db:section.db:para: Draws the pixmap in rectangle rect. The pixmap is aligned according to flags.

db:section.db:title: void QStylePainter::drawItemText(const QRect &rect, int flags, const QPalette &pal, bool enabled, const QString &text, QPalette::ColorRole textRole = QPalette::NoRole)
db:section.db:para: Draws the text in rectangle rect and palette pal. The text is aligned and wrapped according to flags.
The pen color is specified with textRole. The enabled bool indicates whether or not the item is enabled; when reimplementing this bool should influence how the item is drawn.

db:section.db:title: void QStylePainter::drawPrimitive(QStyle::PrimitiveElement pe, const QStyleOption &option)
db:section.db:para: Use the widget's style to draw a primitive element pe specified by QStyleOption option.

db:section.db:title: QStyle *QStylePainter::style() const
db:section.db:para: Return the current style used by the QStylePainter.
